All the other major capital city CBDs had office occupancy rates between 60 and 70 per cent, led by Adelaide and Canberra.
Perth was the only market where the occupancy rate fell between December an… [+1806 chars]

articles.author: Alex Druce, Lucy Battersby
articles.title: As it happened: ASX reaches new 11-month high - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The S&P/ASX 200 gained 0.6% to 6880.7 on Monday, putting it within 4% of the record highs reached in February 2020. Materials, discretionary, and communication stocks pushed higher.
articles.content: Global miner BHP was last 2.3 per cent higher at $44.82, while Rio Tinto gained 3.3 per cent to $117.01, Fortescue Metals jumped 3 per cent to $23.92 and Mineral Resources was 5.3 per cent up at $36.… [+1155 chars]
